MONDAY Sept PERIOD   HealthDay News  Patients with chronic hepatitis C virus HCV who do not respond to hepatitis B virus HBV vaccine should undergo revaccination after HCV treatment and eradication according to a study published online July  in The Journal of Infectious Diseases PERIOD

Noting that patients with chronic HCV do not respond to HBV vaccination as efficiently as the general population Jesse G PERIOD Powell from Hennepin Healthcare in Minneapolis and colleagues examined whether revaccination after HCV treatment improves response PERIOD Previous HBV vaccine nonresponders were recruited for revaccination after HCV eradication PERIOD

Thirtyone of  enrolled patients underwent followup hepatitis B surface antibody HBsAb testing one month after vaccine series completion PERIOD The researchers found that  of the patients . percent produced a reactive HBsAb eight were nonreactive and two had equivocal results . and . percent respectively PERIOD No significant differences were seen in HBsAb reactivity according to age sex race or presence of advanced fibrosis PERIOD

 coauthor Jose Debes M.D. ph.D. from the University of Minnesota in Minneapolis said in a statement PERIOD 

AbstractFull Text subscription or payment may be required
